alert.note: Alert for Bell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bell County through 815 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Binghamtown, or near Middlesboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ponza and Calvin around 800 PM EDT. Hutch around 805 PM EDT. Cubage around 810 PM EDT. THIS INCLUDES U.S. Highway 25 East in Bell County between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
